title: Advertising Design - Lagos State Parks Services
description: Design compelling advertising materials for Lagos State Parks Services to promote park facilities and recreational activities to the public.

milestones.title: Creative Concept Development
milestones.description: Brainstorm and finalize visual direction, messaging tone, and key campaign themes aligned with the fundraiserâ€™s goals.

milestones.title: Asset Design & Production
